str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
Poor, needy. Prolongation from the base of penes; necessitous.
Feminine of a presumed derivative apparently from the base of chasma through the idea of deficiency; a widow, literally or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
Neuter of a derivative of the same as lepis; something scaled, i.e. A small coin.
